resources.string: Following the classic style design, interpreting the aesthetics of life, both business and technology, meticulously crafted, firm and restrained, shocking the combination of aesthetics and tough machinery. Three-finger swipe right to adjust speed, three-finger left swipe to switch play mode, three-finger slide down to switch color.
Playback speed is switched to %1$s times
You need to download your signature png file from Yiran theme public account and put it on the phone [internal storage / Pictures /] The file name must be
